name: Galois Field
cooked:
Hello,

I have a question: what is exactly Bitcoin inquisition? I’ve seen binana which seems to be some BIPs but I don’t understand the point of Bitcoin inquisition. Seems to have OP_CAT integrated but seems as well to be Bitcoin core.
raw:
Hello, 

I have a question: what is exactly Bitcoin inquisition? 
I’ve seen binana which seems to be some BIPs but I don’t understand the point of Bitcoin inquisition. Seems to have OP_CAT integrated but seems as well to be Bitcoin core.
